translation: You are the Imperishable, the Supreme Being, worthy of being known. You are the great treasure-house of this universe; You are the imperishable protector of the eternal Dharma; You are the Primal Person, I believe.
commentary: 11.18 Thou Thou? The letter imperishable? Paramam the Supreme Being? Veditavyam worthy to be known? You Thou? of this (of) this? Visvasya of universe? But the great? treasurehouse treasurehouse? You Thou? Infinitive imperishable? Shasvatadharmagopta Protector of the Eternal Dharma? Sanatanah ancient? You Thou? Purusha: Purusha? Opinion thought? May of me.Commentary VisvasyaNidhaanam Treasurehouse of this universe? also
